cab.content: CABINETFARM PRICE review memorandum by the Minister of Agriculture, Fisheries and Food-I attach for the convenience of my colleagues a schedule which shows:Column 1: The latest proposals by the Farmers' Unions.Column 2: A counter proposal which I would recommend that we make to the Farmers' Unions in order to get a settlement.I will report orally on the chances of securing agreement at this level.C. S.Ministry of Agriculture, Fisheries and Food, S.W. I,11th March, 1964.4101THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HER BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENTPrinted for the Cabinet. March 1964CP. (64) 70 Copy No. 5113th March, 1964 ANNUAL REVIEW, 1964Changes in Price Guarantees and Production GrantsSCHEDULE Guaranteed Prices as Column i Column II determined at 1963 Review Change Value Change Value m. m.Price Changes Wheat ......... cwt. 26s. 6d. - ; No change \ - ''Rye ......... cwt. 21s. 7d.
